pages.text: $(marked)Herne$(), the Lord of the Wild Hunt, is commonly pledged to by suffering $(l:bewitchment:curses/lycanthropy)$(marked)lycanthropes$(). He can grant almost total control over the curse, allowing victims to transform on will. Alternatively, he can be offered $(l:bewitchment:introduction/crops)$(item)Aconite$(), removing the curse entirely.$(br2)Summoning him is rather elaborate, and will be outlined in this entry.

pages.title: Summoning Herne
pages.text: To summon Herne, several things are needed:$(li)a $(l:bewitchment:tools/incense#mortal_coil)$(marked)Mortal Coil Incense$()$(li)a $(marked)Wolf$() and $(li)a $(marked)forest or $(marked)taiga$() biome.$(br2)First, start the incense in the right biome, at night. Then you will need to slay a Wolf with an $(l:bewitchment:tools/athame)$(item)Athame$(), not too far away.$()

Choose the place for doing this wisely; you'll need to keep Herne around if you want to pledge to him.$(br2)$(o)Once pledged, you can toggle your Wolf-form by pressing [$(k:bewitchment.transformation_ability)].$()
